thread.title: Oprah is loving life in New Zealand, shares video of helicopter ride over Lake Hawea
thread.title_full: Oprah is loving life in New Zealand, shares video of helicopter ride over Lake Hawea

title: Oprah is loving life in New Zealand, shares video of helicopter ride over Lake Hawea
text:
Oprah is loving life in New Zealand, shares video of helicopter ride over Lake Hawea Last updated 13:22, February 18 2017 Oprah / Instagram 
Oprah Winfrey has shared her breathtaking helicopter ride over flight over Lake Hawea with her 8.3million social media followers. 
Oprah Winfrey appears to be working for Tourism New Zealand, posting endless photos of sweeping landscapes and glorious mountaintops, telling her millions of fans how she just "loves" New Zealand. 
The former daytime television host is filming in Lake Hawea with Reese Witherspoon and Mindy Kaling, who all appear to be having the time of their lives. 
On Saturday morning, the 63-year-old billionaire shared videos of a helicopter ride over the lake and enthusiastically exclaimed, "Amazing, love it!". Her Instagram story continued as they flew above the clouds and she could be heard saying, "Gorgeous day New Zealand, I love you". 
The queen of daytime TV took to the skies over Lake Hawea and appears to be loving life. 
Winfrey, who has 8.3 million fans on the social media website, has been sharing photos every day since filming began on A Wrinkle in Time .
